means: 搞糟，完不成( bungle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: You can't do a thing without bungling it.
Here, the organization has had time to show its true colours, to show its inefficiency and its bungling.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在时间一长，这个机构就露出了真面目，效率低下，差错百出。

sentence.Network_en: 'Enough, too,'retorted George.'We'll all swing and sundry for your bungling.'
sentence.Network_cn: “ 还不够吗? ”乔治反问道, “ 就因为你乱指挥,我们都得荡秋千,被日头晒干. ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: bungler 笨拙而不熟练的工人bungling 拙劣的bunk 床铺
If he keeps bungling , he ' ll lose the job ., 如果他老是拙劣地工作 , 他会失去工作的.
Well , your bungling has set the project back a month . Now try laughing that off !, 嘿 , 你出的差错使工程推迟了一个月 . 现在你休想一笑了之.

list.abs: The electrician bungled the wiring job ., 电工笨拙地做接线工作.

while the world looked on , transfixed , the terrorists held 11 Israeli athletes hostage for 21 tense hours until political bungling resulted in a deadly firefight at a local airport .恐怖分子劫特了11名以色列运动员作为人质，时间长达21小时，由于政治谈判的最终失败，在当地的一个机场爆发了一场生死枪战，全世界上民眼睁睁地看着
their pay was late because of a computer bungle .由于计算机出错，他们的工资晚发了。
bungler 笨蛋bungling fool 笨拙的傻瓜confound 可恶，活该，去死（比damn轻的骂语）.

entry.def: If you bungle something, you fail to do it properly, because you make mistakes or are clumsy.

example.ex: Two prisoners bungled an escape bid after running either side of a lamp-post while handcuffed.
example.tran: 两名被手铐铐在一起的囚犯试图逃跑时分别往电灯杆两边跑，结果没逃掉。

example.ex: ...the FBI's bungled attempt to end the 51 day siege.
example.tran: 联邦调查局为结束持续51天的围困进行的糟糕尝试

means.word_mean: 1. showing lack of skill or aptitude;

sentences.sentence: "his fumbling attempt to put up a shelf"

means.word_mean: 2. not skillful in physical movement especially with the hands;

sentences.sentence: "could scarcely empty a scuttle of ashes, so handless was the poor creature"- Mary H. Vorse

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The critics cite past bungling by the agencies to justify their suspicions.

auth_sentence.content: Undeterred with the disastrous bungling of his associate, Naseer maintained his resolve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Undeterred with the disastrous bungling of his associate, Naseer maintained his resolve.
